answers.answer: No. However, try to remember those measurements are very off late in pregnancy.
My baby girl weighs the same too. As long you pregnancy is healthy, don't worry.
The measurements are an approximate guess they can be off by 8oz is what my ultrasound technician told me. At 30 weeks 3 lbs was average so I don't think 4lbs is too large for you.
My baby is bein measured at 5 lbs and 2 Oz but I also have gestational diabetes so I am expected to have an oversized baby.

Kclynn1508 i have gestational diabetes as well they gave me some pills to make my blood sugars lower and its helping ... that should help make the baby be normal size right?? Do you know? I am 34 weeks now and i been going in one a week... do they have you do that to???

question: I was wondering do yall think 4 lbs and 9 oz is to big for my baby to be at 32 weeks .... ITS A BOY!
title: I AM 32 WEEKS!!!
